ygData.subject: Re: Other Small diety ideas.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I spoke with a senior gm regarding this.  This item IS BROKEN! Don t waste your time.
ygData.messageBody:
I spoke with a senior gm regarding this. This item IS BROKEN! Don't waste
your time.


>From: "Steven Moore" <scully@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ_Potters] Other Small diety ideas.....
>Date: Sat, 10 Jul 1999 12:48:56 +1200
>
>From: "Steven Moore" <scully@...>
>
>I have also seen wooden shards in Faydwer for sale and stackable small
>BALLS
>of clay....so they could be possibles too.
>
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Sean Kennedy <orang@...>
>To: <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 8:03 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Diety Sketch???
>
>
> > From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Carol Testa <caroljt@...>
> > To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
> > Date: Thursday, July 08, 1999 8:22 AM
> > Subject: [EQ_Potters] Diety Sketch???
> >
> >
> > >From: "Carol Testa" <caroljt@...>
> > >
> > >Does anyone know the answer to the question about what is made from
>Diety
> > >Sketches and how its made?
> > >
> > >Chrysiana
> > >Druid/Potter on Cazic Thule
> > >
> >
> >
> > Well, I haven't done this yet, 'cause it'll cost money and time but...
> >
> > The wheel has 6 slots
> > 3 of these are already spoken for :
> > Sketch
> > Water
> > Block of Clay (whichever size)
> >
> > now the other 3 can be one of: empty, clay, glass shards, metal bits.
> >
> > leaving 64 combinations * 3 sizes of block of clay = 192 possible
> > combinations.
> >
> > This is assuming no item uses 2 different sizes of clay block.
> >
> > exhaustive testing should find either a) the right recipe or b) that
>it's
> > broken, and doesn't make anything.
> >
> >
